com.hiddenswitch.spellsource

Interface Invites


  • public interface Invites
    This service allows players to invite each other to private games.

      • accept

        @NotNull
static com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.AcceptInviteResponse accept(@NotNull
                                                                                       com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.impl.InviteId inviteId,
                                                                                       @NotNull
                                                                                       com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.AcceptInviteRequest request,
                                                                                       @NotNull
                                                                                       com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.impl.util.UserRecord user)
                                                                                throws com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution,
                                                                                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        Accepts an invite. If it's a matchmaking invitation, the user will automatically be put into a matchmaking queue and will wait.
        Parameters:
        inviteId - The invite to accept
        request - The request
        user - The user executing the request
        Returns:
        An updated invite and potentially information about the new friend or game.
        Throws:
        com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution
        java.lang.InterruptedException
